Test steps: Verify that the software in the meter (except metrological software) and the communication unit can be upgraded from HES.
Verify that missing measurements are sent automatically to HES. Verify that missing measurements can be manually retrieved from the meter.
Verify that missing measurements are sent automatically to HES. Verify that missing measurements can be manually retrieved from the meter.
Verify that HES has functionality to import measurement data from a standardized text file format, such as csv.
